text: Even farther than these seven worlds is situated the hell, Where the soul of the sinner goes to after the death.
Some of the main names of hell are - Raurav, Shukar, Rodh, Taal, Vivasan and Mahajwala etc.
The soul of a sinner goes to each of these hells according to the magnitude of his sins.
A man should worship lord Shiva and sing hymns in his praise to get liberated from his sins.
title: Liberation From Hell
